name: Bigger Emoji-/Sticker-Picker for Telegram Web
description:
Scales the picker for Emojis and Stickers up for Telegram Web. Also doubles the size of Emojis in the picker and the size of Stickers. Compatible with different color schemes.
(Not recommended for screen sizes below 900px wide or 750px high)
additional_info:
I will probably never update this. So if it's deprecated you're on your own ;)

== v0.4. (30.04.19) ==
Don't scale Emojis in the preview of a new Sticker-Set

== v0.3. (29.04.19) ==
Option to scale the recommended Stickers (that pop up when typing an emoji)

== v0.2. (29.04.19) ==
Scaling of Emoji and Stickers optional

== v0.1. (29.04.19) ==
Initial release
